name: FST-7 (Fascia Stretch Training) — ~8 min finisher
time_per_session_breakdown: 7 sets x ~20s each + 45s rest x 6 ≈ 8 min
overview_and_execution: Pick an isolation exercise as a finisher. Perform 7 sets of 8–12 reps with short rests (30–45s), maximizing pump and tension. Incorporate brief flexing or stretching between sets.
example_application: Leg Extensions, 7×10 @ 100 lb, ~40s rest. Pose or stretch quads between sets.
important_notes: Stay hydrated; rest is minimal. Typically done at the end of a workout. Aim for a deep pump. Great for hypertrophy ‘finishing’ effects.
